page.title: 20 Woolston Area
page.content: The area mainly consists of shops, houses and ware-houses. There is one main street for shopping. A lot of the houses are on the roads near the main street. Near the main street is the small Shipyard of Vosper-Thornycroft. Woolston has its own Railway station, it is a multiple track and many office workers come on the trains to work. Along the river many people come to do fishing during their spare time. Also the people there are quiet and polite to strangers. Peoples views:Not enough facilities for the youth.
